argumentText:
ARGUMENT
z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | frrlem5.1 | |- R Fr A |
| 2 |  | frrlem5.2 | |- R Se A |
| 3 |  | frrlem5.3 | |- B = { f | E. x ( f Fn x /\ ( x C_ A /\ A. y e. x Pred ( R , A , y ) C_ x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( y G ( f |` Pred ( R , A , y ) ) ) ) ) } |
| 4 |  | #P_ssel | |- ( C C_ B -> ( z e. C -> z e. B ) ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_frrlem2 | |- ( z e. B -> Fun z ) |
| 6 |  | #P_funrel | |- ( Fun z -> Rel z ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( z e. B -> Rel z ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl6 | |- ( C C_ B -> ( z e. C -> Rel z ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ralrimiv | |- ( C C_ B -> A. z e. C Rel z ) |
| 10 |  | #P_reluni | |- ( Rel U. C <-> A. z e. C Rel z ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylibr | |- ( C C_ B -> Rel U. C ) |
